text.tspan: chief executive officer ( CEO ) , president and chief
architect , while also being largest individual shareholder
is one of best - known entrepreneurs
After this process, we use this resolved text to extract
the named entities from the text.
During the Named Entity Recognition process, we use
the Stanford NLP library to discover the
entities in the text, obtained from the previous step.
From this, we save a list of the entity mentions
We can see in the following snippet, the resulting
We use this result to search for more information,
to expand knowledge, by querying the Wikipedia
API in order to obtain an “extract” (which corresponds
to the summary of an entity on the Wikipedia
This process is not done for all the entities found
in the text, because some of them will not result
more knowledge (e.g., we exclude numbers, dates and
so on); this will also speed up the process as
each GET request can take time.
Tekno is capable of enriching the information retrieved
by the input text using Wikipedia. This is used
Search keys term of the text to retrieve a small summary
with the term, as illustrated above, and
